long_description: The Patagonia Corduroy skirt has a secret! Stretch corduroy ensures this skirt moves comfortably with you. Organic cotton corduroy has light stretch for comfort and mobility. Flat waistband with belt loops, zip fly and shank closure. Back yoke adds shape. Front pockets with button flaps; rear patch pockets. Regular fit; hits above knees.
short_description: The Patagonia Corduroy skirt has a secret! Stretch corduroy ensures this skirt moves comfortably with you.
